caption.title: Clinical phase vaccine candidates for the coronavirus disease 2019.
caption.p: aAPC: Artificial antigen-presenting cells; Ad5-nCoV: Adenovirus Type 5 vectored COVID-19 vaccine; DC: Dendritic cell; LNP: Lipid nanoparticles; LV: Lentiviral vector; S: Spike; SARS-CoV-2: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2.
